KA-BAR has been around since 1898 making high quality knives. Once called Union Cutlery Company, KA-BAR is now well known for their fighting knives of WWII, KA-BAR still makes their favorite classics and exciting new models. KA-BAR's name change stems from the phrase "killed a bear" or "K-A-BAR."
